availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Spencer (Owsley County, KY, farmer and Wolfe County JP)

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Jemima Spencer. Father of James A. Spencer, Ann Spencer, Malackia Spencer, Mark Spencer, Ibby Spencer, Delila Spencer, Michael Spencer, Josephine Spencer, and Daniel B. Spencer. Farmer in Owsley County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Owsley County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Wolfe County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 290A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 411.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wolfe County, Precinct 4, p. 450A.
“Lynn Boyd Spencer,” Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 4697.
KYR-0001-020-0444
